name: @car2db/mcp-server
description: Search and browse vehicle specifications from Car2DB — makes, models, trims, equipment and full technical data

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Your Car2DB API key (optional, demo key will be used if not provided). Get your key at https://car2db.com/api/ or try demo at https://car2db.com/api-token-demo/

language.title: Language
language.description: Response language: en-US, ru-RU, de-DE, es-ES, it-IT, pl-PL, fr-FR, da-DA, lv-LV, th-TH, zh-CN

prompts.name: find_vehicle
prompts.description: Search for a specific vehicle by make, model and year
prompts.text: Find and show me detailed information about: ${arguments.query}. Use search_vehicles tool to find the vehicle, then get_trim_full to show complete specifications.

prompts.name: compare_vehicles
prompts.description: Compare technical specifications of two vehicles

prompts.name: vehicle_specs
prompts.description: Get detailed technical specifications for a vehicle
prompts.text: Show me complete technical specifications for: ${arguments.vehicle}. Include engine details, performance, transmission, dimensions, and available equipment packages. Use search_vehicles and get_trim_full tools.

prompts.name: browse_make
prompts.description: Browse all models and generations for a specific manufacturer
prompts.text: Show me all models and their generations available from ${arguments.make}. Use browse_catalog tool starting with makes level to navigate through the manufacturer's lineup.

prompts.name: vehicles_by_year
prompts.description: Find all vehicles available for a specific production year
prompts.text: Show me all vehicle makes and models that were produced in ${arguments.year}. Use get_year_vehicles tool to retrieve the information.
